definition: reduce the incidence or severity of or stop
details:
verb
- reduce the incidence or severity of or stop
= example: reduce the incidence or severity of or stop
- to put down by force or authority
= example: to put down by force or authority
- put out of one's consciousness
= synonyms: repress
- control and refrain from showing
= synonyms: inhibit, bottle up
- come down on or keep down by unjust use of one's authority
